description: This file implements a TokenCache class responsible for storing, retrieving, and managing token entries with expiry logic in a caching mechanism. It includes methods to put tokens into the cache, get tokens with expiry validation, and clear the cache.

classes.name: TokenCache
classes.description: A class that manages cached token entries with expiry handling and thread safety.

methods.name: void Put(const std::string & key,const TokenEntry & entry)
methods.description: Stores a token entry in the cache associated with a key, with thread safety.

methods.name: bool Get(const std::string & key,std::string & outJson) const
methods.description: Retrieves a token JSON string from the cache if it exists and is valid (not expired or expiring soon).

methods.name: void Clear()
methods.description: Clears all entries from the cache.

methods.name: bool IsExpiringSoon(uint64_t nowEpochSec,uint64_t expiryEpochSec) const
methods.description: Checks if a token is nearing expiry based on the current time and a refresh window.

ctags.name: Get
ctags.pattern: /^    bool TokenCache::Get(const std::string& key, std::string& outJson) const {$/

ctags.name: IsExpiringSoon
ctags.pattern: /^    bool TokenCache::IsExpiringSoon(uint64_t nowEpochSec, uint64_t expiryEpochSec) const {$/

ctags.name: Put
ctags.pattern: /^    void TokenCache::Put(const std::string& key, const TokenEntry& entry) {$/
